vocabInfos.mediumDef:
Group of te.man (תֵּימָן "Teman" H8487H)
§ Temanite or Temani = see Teman "southward"
This name is used for:
1) an inhabitant of Teman located east of Idumea
2) a descendant of Teman, the grandson of Esau and a duke of Edom
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
提幔人 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 提幔(Teman [8487]) "向南的"
提幔地的居民, 其地在以土買東方
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
提幔人 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 见 提幔(Teman [8487]) "向南的"
提幔地的居民, 其地在以土买东方
